entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
